ValidationMessage.name: ValidatePlannedTourStartEndDate
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Planned Start Date can not be greater than Planned End Date

ValidationMessage.name: ValidateWarehouseAndCoDriver
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Select an active user of the start warehouse as the co-driver.

ValidationMessage.name: ValidateTruck
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Select a truck that’s an active vehicle for Start Warehouse.

ValidationMessage.name: ValidateTrailer
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Select a trailer that’s an active vehicle for Start Warehouse.

ValidationMessage.name: Trailer1_Trailer2_Same_Validation
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You can’t select the same vehicle for Trailer 1 and Trailer2.

ValidationMessage.name: ValidateEndTour
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Finish all End Tour activities before completing the tour

ValidationMessage.name: ValidateOdometerEnd
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Enter a final odometer reading that’s greater than or equal to the initial odometer reading.
ValidationMessage.comment: validate if final odometer reading is greater than or equal to initial odometer reading.

ValidationMessage.name: ValidateVehicleStatusEnd
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Select the End Tour Condition Reason as the vehicle isn’t in good condition upon finishing the tour.
ValidationMessage.comment: validate if End Tour Condition Reason is empty if vehicle is not in good condition.
